name: collectedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you think or speak collectedly, you do so in a way that shows you are in control of your feelings: "I can think of a lot of things you seem to me to be," she said after a moment, very collectedly. "But I must say that boring isn't one of them". After scoring a goal, he walked back to the centre of the field, calmly and collectedly.
